title: Watching Sumo Live Was Something Else..

comments.comment: Edgars sneeze at 1:53 was so powerful it changed the camera angle. Good transition Edgar lol

Lol, man I love watching Felix's calm and happy vlogs, everything he does and just seeing him enjoy life while simultaneously not leaving his fanbase behind and occasionally posting is just so beautiful. He is just living such a content life in Japan with his wife and dogs. Awesome.
I appreciate that Felix sticks around and shares his story. A YouTuber that retires the right way. Does not abandon his supporters.

I've been watching Marzia and Pewds since 2014 - they played a huge part in my teens (now 23) - and I'm genuinely so happy to see them enjoying their lives together in Japan. Seeing all the ups and downs they have been through and watching and supporting their journey also showed me how involved I actually am. When Pewds uploaded his first vlog of moving to Japan I couldn’t hold back my tears when they also realized with theirs in their eyes and a faces full of excitement and happiness that they made it to Japan - it just warms my heart seeing them living their best life in Japan and I wish them and their family all the best <3
so happy to see Pewds  taking his YT channel to the NEXT LEVEL, in Japan, enjoying life, going to new places, and sharing with the world thru his vlogs.

The "Clown guy" is Azumaryu, he actually won the match! You guys just mistook him for the opponant xD
It was a HUGE deal for him aswell, although he is an aging veteran this was his first ever winning record in the highest division.
As an aging Pewdipie & Sumo fan myself, this episode is pure gold xD

As much as I miss seeing more frequent Pewds uploads in my feed, it brings me real joy to see a slice of Felix and Marzia's new and exciting life in Japan. Really happy for them and thrilled to get a glimpse of it all.

That sumo section was so interesting. I loved it a lot. There’s something so rewarding watching them actually accept the money, it’s like you know why they’re there and you get to watch them claim the prize. Wonder why more sports don’t do this. There is something within us humans that like seeing someone rewarded for their work.
This is honestly the best pewdiepie era I'm so happy to just relax and watch these snippets of his life

Happy to see you enjoying live Felix! 
God i loved this vlog so much

As a person who loves sumo I'm so glad you finally went to see it live! 

It's great tradition filled sport and too often overlooked, hope you can go sometime again. Everyone should go atleast once if they're in Japan during tournaments or tours.
As a sumo fan, I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the sumo tournament. By the way, the Sumo Tournament is held every other month, so if you would like to see it, please come during that month.

Glad you enjoyed your time at the sumo tournament Felix! There's a growing English language Sumo community, and there's way more to it as a sport than is often assumed! The really small wrestler who pushed out a much bigger opponent is fan favourite Enho, one of the lightest wrestlers to compete at a high level. January's tournament is now wrapped up, but I encourage folks to look into Sumo on YouTube!
I’ve never been so excited about new Pew content since the Minecraft days. I LOVE this content. And Marzia is editing, right? Such a great job. These videos are like comfort food for the soul.

How cool is it seeing Pewds grown up and still just doing what he loves. I’ve spent the best part of 10 years watching his videos and just last week I actually went strawberry picking with my wife of 6 months so far! We also have booked a 20day holiday to Japan in June! To think where I was when I first started watching to now has been an incredible journey. It’s so nice to see Felix enjoying his as well!
Thank you for showing us Japan’s culture and environment through your eyes. I enjoy every mf minute of your vlogs and I’m smiling the entire video.
I haven't smiled this much in a while, watching pewds living at fullest after seeing him my whole life feels soo good and satisfying
Felix & Marzia taking care of their pets like babies is so adorable to witness, mad respect for 12 years of hard work
i hope felix never stops these vlogs. even though he doesn’t get as many views as he used to i love watching these chill and interesting videos.

Recently just got into sumo lol
Nice to see Enho as a sekitori and especially Takakeisho when he was still active. Dude was a beast.
There's different sides of Youtube.. and this part is one of the those videos that makes you feel comfy, chill and home.
These vids are like therapy man, work is tough and life is hard but sitting in my car on my lunch break enjoying these calming Japan vlogs makes my day a little better.

Well, you’ve officially “out-Japaned” me. I’ve lived here for 20 years and I still haven’t seen a live sumo match. 
Nice work.

Loved watching the sumo bit! My husband and I are big fans and watch every tournament. I was especially happy to see you get Enho on camera (the smaller guy who got the bigger guy out in the lower division)! He's one of my favourites!

That ramen museum looked so cool too!

It is insane to think that when I was traveling in Japan with my wife, just around a week ago, I was in my hotel room and I turned on the TV and THIS sumo tournament was on. I thought to myself, "what is the demographic for this kind of thing?" because it is definitely a memorable introduction to Japanese TV. I looked in the audience and saw a bunch of old people, and I though "sounds about right." However, it is amazing to know that I watched this from my hotel, Felix was THERE!! I also did enjoy it even though I wasn't live.
I really appreciate the edits here like it’s recorded and we are a big family watching moments together… it feels so wholesome I love it
I get so happy watching Pewds japan vlogs! Keep it up and stay enjoying life with Marzia n the pugs ️
I love the Momo and Edgar moments! And seeing you and Marzia live life is just so inspiring. Thanks for keeping us a part of your life!
Never seen actual Sumo before. That was interesting, so I appreciate Felix sharing and the venue being cool with him recording.
I love Felix's energy so much
Wow, the sumo part was insane. This was the first time I watched a match. It's more complex than what I thought. Greetings Pewds.
Man, i remember first watching him in 2012. he was so different. so grown up now. im so happy that i was here to watch his life unfold and his fame and now retirement. truly a treasure of my life
Love seeing Pewds being able to just chill with Connor and Joey bros
Honestly if Felix just decides to post videos like this for the rest of his YouTube days I'd be completely fine with it️
Very happy to see sumo on this channel. The guy who won at the end (Takakeisho) ended up winning the entire tournament yesterday on Sunday, so many more money envelopes for him. :)
15:56 ヨロイさんに困惑するPewDiePie

See this is why I stay wit pewdiepie he just acts just like a regular person he doesn't act like he is better than anyone else he makes videos that's not cringey when he make videos out in public he is respectful, and humble like I'm happy he is still alive and enjoying his life

I love the energy that Momo brings to the family. I too have an older dog and he doesn't really play like he used to, mostly just sleeps, but I'm glad they get to experience that playful puppy energy.
Chill video pewds, been a bro army since 2012 and see you enjoying your life makes me happy for you
I smile the whole time I watch these life story videos. So wholesome and happy. Wish I could go to Japan
Mad stuff still kicking, love these vids pewds dont feel any pressure over your upload schedule btw. I just love being able to watch your story as it comes whenever you feel like sharing.
I was having a bad week, but this really lifted me up. Everything about it. Thank you Felix.
Felix is so calm nowadays. It's visible in his face that he is doing YT just to enjoy his life. After a decade of non-stop grind, a peaceful life this is well deserved.

i love how the sumo wrestlers are so, gentle with each other before and after the fight is over, the seem to have so much respect for their opponent, even tho they are enemies during the match, when possible if someone gets pushed out they just kind of gently hold each other and mentally say to each other "good match",
Seeing the new puppy reminds me when maya was a puppy, and it makes me tear up with joy to remember those amazing moments but also witness all new ones

Japan needs to work on marketing sumo harder, it's a very very cool sport and basically every human knows how sumo wrestlers look but we never get to see them fight or to know their names, they deserve far more recognition.
Sumo is awesome. Its the one sport I admire. So much tradition and sportmanship.  Sumotori are devoted it is a delight to cheer them on through each Basho!
It’s really nice seeing chill Felix, living life in Japan. Doing what he loves to do and having fun.

I just like that Pewds never let fame get to him. Like these videos are so humble and wholesome. Like for a well of as he's not that into materialistic things and flexing and rather into cute and simple yet satisfying experiences.
Following your new life in Japan is a true joy to watch!
Love that he still talk swedish to hos dogs so nice to see that he keeps the Swedish not just in swear words. (From a Swedish perspective)

Okay I went down the sumo rabbit hole of youtube. These guys aren't just lazy dudes eating and shoving each other around. These sumo wrestlers go hard in their training, there are rules up the buns, and to see a tournament like this to be my first experience with the sport is crazy. Thank you Felix for sharing these kinds of videos. Really appreciate it!

Holy hell man this video really lifted my spirits, just seeing a new place and culture that I get to explore alongside someone I’ve idolized since a child is amazing. I love this content and would love to see pewds do this for as long as he wants

I really love seeing all the wholesome comments of how happy everyone is seeing that pewds and mariza seems
to be living their life in Japan  I wish them all the happiness to them and this awesome community still following their journey
as a sumo fan i couldn't be happier to see you enjoy sumo pewds

I live in Tokyo, but I have never been to most of the attractions in this video.
I think he truly loves Japan.And I think I'd like to join them too.

22:50 YouTube content this last 5 years has been a ride, from chaotic, depressing, extravagant, extreme, over the top, you name it and as a consumer and an avid YouTube enjoyer myself it's sometimes put weight on you.
the parasocial relationship you've build, the emotion you had on certain ideas topics makes you question everything you've known for, widens your knowledge of your self and the world your living. 

this kinds of videos really resets me from everything I have.
also reminds me to be calm and collective, enjoy the people, the things, atmosphere, aesthetic for everything that is happening right now.

I've been blessed enough to witness such evolution of a amazing person like Felix. you might not read this buried in comments, no what happens words can't express my genuine admiration towards this guy. such a character. love you sir. GG
Pewds, cmon man, thank you for bringing us these slices of life. I am so grateful that I got to experience these at this time of my life.

3D Printing advice: If the heatbed doesn’t stick anymore, it‘s probably because you touched it with you fingers too much. Try cleaning it with either IPA or some soapy water :)
Also inform yourself on the different filaments, as they need different temperatures and might not stick, because the bed is too cold/ hot
Gotta love a Connor and Joey surprise appearance.
Sumo was next level. Thank you for letting us witness that greatness.
I've never seen an actual sumo match before they actually look like alot of fun
I loved Felix's reaction to Enho's bout. Seeing someone small win against a bigger guy is always awesome.

Sometimes I think good on you pewds for moving to japan.. I hope you’re happy there! It’s a very bold move and it’s awesome to see you just do your thing! As a fan of pewds for ages I hope you’re happy and we love you!
It's amazing how much early comments differ from comments that have been posted upwards from five hours of the video being posted, everyone just seems so wholesome

Pewds you have such a healthy mindset about life, having fun, and improving oneself. I am glad that these vlogs have been reflecting your true energy about the world and I hope that your character rubs off on everyone who watches these videos.
I dont want these to end.  Thanks for the vid Felix
seeing Felix so happy is just amazing, he really deserves it

I recently went down a sumo rabbit hole myself, I'd really like to know more about the traditions. Apparently they did it during samurai times and the winners were able to become retainers for the lords. Nobunaga was a fan of sumo. Sumo became the entertainment spectacle during the Edo period. Sumos were actually ripped but since there's no weight classes, they put on the size. It's possible for smaller guys to win with skill.

Felix and Marzia, I just wanted to thank you two for all the years of entertainment. Your work is greatly appreciated by the world. I am suffering from chronic headaches and nothing could make me feel better, but I opened this video and the soothing sounds and editing made me feel relax and gave me some relief. I thank you two so so much, have a beautiful and happy life ️
I'm not Japanese but I've been watching sumo religiously for over 3 years now and I was EXCITED to see sumo in your title..so happy you were able to experience it live

I recently just got back from a Japan trip and its so weird seeing you hit up the same places I did! I went to Nikko Toshogu and the Yokohama Ramen museum! I highly reccomend the ramen museum to anyone, especially in winter because its such a great indoor activity out of the cold. Fill yourself with delicious ramen before heading back out! 

A really fun video! Looking forward to seeing some more videos with either more snow or even sakura season!
I'm so happy for Felix for living his best life. I hope I too will reach this happines and peace in my life one day
I tear up everytime I see Edgar without Maya. It's been a while but it still stings a bit. Hope that Felix and Marzia are handling things better than I do. And hopefully Edgar does too.

The sumo fight was sooooooo nice :O Marzia looked especially beautiful at the strawberry thing and Momo seem really happy while Edgar relax. It's nice to see you enjoying life Pewds, thanks for the video, hope to see more soon :D
My grandmother was Japanese and we used to watch Sumo a lot at her house.
I love how calm pewds new videos are.

I actually watch that Sumo on a livestream on twitch! I got really into it this Basho and am so excited to see your live footage from the event. You even have footage of Asa!! Who is my favorite! Thanks for posting this, super exciting!
I love seeing how much Pewds and Marzia have grown over the years it makes me so so so happy
めちゃくちゃ影響力のある人が相撲を見に行ってくれるのはありがたい
I love seeing how excited Momo is about life! What a happy and sweet little one
I don't think I've watched a Pewds video in over 2 years, and it's shocking the change that's happened, but I love seeing all the cool stuff he's up to now! It kind of makes me wish I kept watching.
Nice to see Pewds spending time with Conner and Joey

Thank you for talking to us through the camera and making us feel involved, in the sumo match, I really appreciate it and it shows you care about your audience and see them as friends coming along with you.
You should check the 3D printing material whether it releases particles into the air since it's in a room you use a lot, some materials can be very harmful, especially since your printer isn't closed

We need an hour vlog lol. 20 mins feels like 5mins sad.

Love seeing you both so happy and relaxed.
Biggup Pewds for making more videos lately while also not being under stress
Saw one of these vlogs after a long time, I'm so glad I did! They are still as beautiful, cozy and comforting. These vlogs are like a gentle hug. Lots of love.
Man seeing pewds enjoying his life in japan makes me cry we've come far

I love watching Felix go through different Japan places, lifestyle and many more things related to that, I guess its a dream of mine and many people to be at a country like that with a different culture and different experiences, thank you Felix for this content, Im glad seeing you happy, I dont usually comment but I admire your transformation to a now more mature Felix.
So interesting that they give them the money directly after the match right on stage. Also, the old lady behind you at the match was having so much fun watching you film and be excited about Sumo.
Love watching the little bugger enjoying herself, hopping around etc
21:42 FLOOR GANG UHH!!
19:55 you can recognise Tochinoshin from a mile away. Greatest sumo wrestler ever IMO. (big georgian guy in green who won that match.), So happy to see he's still competing in 2023 despite his knee.
I hope Edgar is taking well the loss of Maya, it can be hard for them to say goodbye. Much love from Spain
I live for the vlogs so much...honestly my favorite era of pewds :) these kinds of vids have become more comfort videos

I hope Felix wouldn't take this the wrong way, I have completely stopped watching the other videos, gaming, the videos with Ken, the goofy ones. After he started posting these vlog videos and giving us insight into his daily life, the other videos feel.. soo dull to me. 

I'm sure they are still entertaining (obvious by view counts) but these... man, these are soo wholesome and great that I've started to prefer this over anything. Maybe it's because I'm 31, idk.. lol 

Felix went from my "HaHas youtuber" to my feel good youtuber. These videos, every time they end I catch myself with a smile and just genuinely feeling happy. There isn't another youtuber that makes me feel that vicarious, genuine happiness.

If you do look through comments every now and then, I'm sorry for your loss man, I know how difficult that is, I'm sure you've heard it 1000 times , 100 000 times by now, but I really feel you. 

Your puppy is fuckin adorable too, that leaf stuff, lol good times. I'm looking forward to seeing that spunky rascle grow up :p

These kind of videos remind me of after you beat a game and then just have fun and calmly drive and explore as everything has already been done and now it is time to enjoy oneself and not stress too much. 

Well deserved, and as someone that has been watching since back in 2012-2013 the distinct change in Felix has been akin to a older sibling I grew up alongside, and can not wait for what comes next!
It’s so adorable how Felix talks to his dogs, shit is too pure <33
Having Felix call them “The Kjellbergs” even now is adorable to me

Aww Felix is such a dad  I love these Japan vlogs!! 
Been able to grow up with Pewds has been awesome. I still  play video games and I try to watch Felix plays as much as I can, but these Vlogs are chef’s kiss
Good to see you and Marzia, glad you guys are doing well. Loved the 3D printed piece for the light, did a great job.

I know that everyone is saying this and I just want to chime in and say that these vlogs literally make my day! Everytime I go on YouTube I check if Pewds has uploaded something. The “mundane stuff” seems so nice and makes me feel so cozy to just watch how you guys go for a bike ride or just eat ramen. The sumo fights seem epic, I’ve never seen a fight like this! Definitely makes me want to see more Sumo wrestling! Thank you for making my day
I haven't smiled so much in a long time, watching pewds to the fullest after watching him in the videos all my life feels so good and satisfying.
I definitely miss the old style of pewdiepie videos, but the new Era of Pewds is awesome. The vlog content is so calming, I can’t wait to get the chance to visit Japan.
Every time I watch Felix’s vlogs it makes me feel so calm and want to visit Japan it seems so nice there.
The fact that Marzia was already pregnant during this vlog and none of us knew just makes it so much better and special

These vlogs are some of my favorite videos he ever made  just ralxing, daily life in Japan  
Slice of life anime era of Pewds
I appreciate the strawberry eating pov. As a person who's allergic to strawberries, you have my gratitude. Marzia's bangs is adorbs btw. Keep the vlogs coming.
10:54 is Momo on the mochi and I love it

The sumo fight was without a doubt the best part, seeing how two people so incredibly big and strong have that physical resistance to be able to defeat the other without having to do so much damage is amazing.
as someone who really likes watching grand sumo, seeing someone introduced to the sport with such wonder makes me happy.
All of Pewd's japan blog are Masterpieces!  So glad he records all his experiences.

Thank you thank you THANK YOU for taking us with you to the Ramen Museum!!! 

I've left a comment about it on quite a few of your other videos and even though I never expected you to see them I hoped you would. 

That place is AMAZING and I'm so glad you went :) 
Thank you again for taking us along for the ride, I appreciate it more than you know! ️ 

Be well, you two, and stay awesome!
These vlogs make me feel so chilled, they're hypnotizing. Vlogs are the videos I appreciate most at this point. Thanks Felix

THIS is the video I've been waiting for. Sumo needs more western exposure. It's an awesome sport with some of the most dedicated rikishi. It's a shame you missed the Hakuho era but this way there's actually a chance someone else can win.
This is the good old Youtube! wholesome, nice clips about noting and anything... Love it Pews!
Watching these is like watching an old friend growing up and watching him live my life goals on Youtube while i sit on my ass eating munchies in my room
Rewatching this while knowing that Marzia was already pregnant during filming… it hits different. Congratulations!!
a friend of mine and I LOOOVE watching Sumo! Were in america so weve never seen it in person, but its an extremely entertaining sport! Glad you got a chance to see it :D
As someone who also watches sumo, it's interesting to see it through Pew's lens, also I'm a fan of Enho "red belt little sumo guy" he's really good
At first I didn't think I would enjoy watching these VLogs. Now since I have, it allows me to see a bit of what it's like outside of the US and I feel it brings me enjoyment seeing it.
私は日本人です。日本の初詣を楽しんでいるあなたを見てとても嬉しいです。今年も頑張って下さい!(I am Japanese. I am very happy to see you enjoying New Year's visit to Japan. Please do your best again this year!)
I never usually comment on videos but man pewds your videos really give me hope that everything is going to be just fine and for that I thank you from the bottom of my heart

I’ve always thought “hatsumode” referred to the first visit to a Shinto shrine in the new year.  The temple visit is usually on December 31st, and has another name. At least that’s my area (Mie Pref), so it could be a regional difference.
13:34  I'm a 65yo American and that took me way back to my childhood.  What coke machines were like here in the 60's.  Bottle opener and all.
I would never thought that sumo can be so intense and interesting to watch
I love this vlogs of pewds it's so comforting

I’m not gonna lie, I’m jealous seeing someone live the life that I’ve always wanted. I know it sounds stupid, and I am happy for Felix with his new life and Japan, but wow, I pray I will one day get to the place Felix is right now.
PewDiePie's Japan vlogs never fails to bring me happiness, one day I will live in Japan and live the dream
Its great to see Felix living his best life in Japan, doing what he loves and having fun.
You have no idea how much these vlogs make me happy.
Pewds vlogs are just something else. I feel more motivated looking at them.
Those sumo matches were really cool to watch, thanks for showing them.

Even Japanese people don't go to see sumo on a daily basis unless they really like it, I went 25 years ago. I do watch sumo on TV.
日本の生活楽しんでるみたいだね、良かった
Edgar blaming gaijin for the trash on the road was top tier comedy.
It's great that Felix is still living his life with the old energy even though he isn't watched as much as he used to ️
I love these vlogs and am so happy to see Pewds and Marzia enjoying life in Japan
I can’t stop smiling while watching the SUMO matches, what an amazing experience. Thank you Felix for sharing it with us! BIG PP!
love these type of videos ! pewds really found his peace and life and as a long last fan, I love following ur journey
